title: Perigord cuisine
creator_credit: Regis Dervelle and BCD France - TV Ontario Canada
brief_description: Provides an overview of the cuisine of the Perigord region in France. Shows the harvesting of the food items used as ingredients. Presents a demostration on how to cook some dishes from the region including scrambled eggs with truffles, truffle feullette, and mousse de foie gras covered with ham and flaky pastry.
